a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Emissions of air pollutants, United States, 1970 to 2016
Annual emissions of various air pollutants, indexed to emission levels in the first year of data. Values in 1970 or 1990
are normalised to 100; values below 100 therefore indicate a decline in emissions. Volatile organic compounds (VOCs)
Data source: UK DEFRA; US EPA
